title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip)
4. Click on the 'Export' button

Observed Behavior:
An error message box pops up stating 'Problems were encountered during the export' and the detail points to the file with the same name in project2 (e.g., foo.txt in project 2).

Expected Behavior:
The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
OB: An error message box pops up stating 'Problems were encountered during export' and the detail points to the file with the same name in project2 (e.g., foo.txt in project 2)
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip)
4. Click on the 'Export' button
